tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Batra for the first time today for my baby’s hives and fever, he is such a gentleman he listened to me so patiently and calmed us down. I googled alot of things and he listened to each and every word and without being rude or uninterested he calmed us down and prescribed the medicines. I am highly satisfied and will consult him only whenever my child will fall sick. 100% recommended, such a good and patient doctor in Delhi.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for vaccination of my 8 month's old daughter and sneezing problem. He helped me in understanding the treatment and I am highly satisfied with his quick and understandable answers. I highly recommend Dr Batra as a pediatrician for your child / infant.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** ****** ****** * **** **** He is a gem of Asian institute of medical science. I am visiting to him for last seven years. My son was born there. Since then to till date I with my son visiting him regularly. He is very nice doctor.

tags: None
review:
****** ******* ******** *** *********** ** **** ********* He treats the patient with lots of care and patience. *** ********* ** ********** *** **** ********** Our baby has hardly had fever or unnecessary pains after Vaccination. We highly recommend Dr. Batra.
Thank You!

tags: None
review:
Even after being regular to this doctor from day one of our baby and getting all the vaccinations from him. We contacted him on phone in case of emergency but he totaly ignored and talked rudely. 
He has always pressurised us to go for expensive and out off the list vaccination. Please beware.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: My experience with the Doctor has been wonderful. From the  time my son was born he has been advising and explaining us all details related to his well being and health in detail. A doctor who is available all the time for consultation and does not advice unnecessary medication and investigations. Thank you Doctor for all your support till date.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
**** ****** ********* **** ** ** ************ ** ********** Doesnt give a quick response over msgs for his patient for whom he has been the pediatrician since her birth. Doesnt take calls after working hrs.

Overall really disappointing ** ****  **** * *** ** * ******** **** ******** ********

In the absence of his response over phone, i had to take my 7 month old daughter to emergency of other hospital.

tags: None
review: Dr anil batra is a very experienced pediatrician. We always received genuine treatment for our little one. He always does medication for root problem. He is nice to talk with for any minor or silly motherly concern. Thanks dr.
